    • Method Detail

      • requestTypeA

        HF14443RequestEntity requestTypeA()
        寻卡(Search card)
        Returns:
        success will return HF14443RequestEntity data, failure will return null.

      • requestTypeA

        HF14443RequestEntity requestTypeA(int mode)
        寻卡(Search card)
        Parameters:
        mode - 0x26:request idle; 0x52:request all
        Returns:
        success will return HF14443RequestEntity data, failure will return null.

      • authentication

        boolean authentication(byte cMode,
                       byte cBlock,
                       byte[] pcKey)
                throws RFIDArgumentException
        验证14443A卡(Authentication 14443A card)
        Parameters:
        cMode - 模式0x60:类型A,0x61类型B (0x60 A type key, 0x61 B type key)
        cBlock - 要写入的数据块S50 0-63,S70 0-255(the cBlock of card,such as S50 card value 0~63,S70 0~255)
        pcKey - 6个字节的密码(6 bytes key value)
        Returns:
        true:success false:fail RFIDArgumentException
        Throws:
        RFIDArgumentException

      • readBlock

        byte[] readBlock(byte cBlock)
        读卡(Read card)
        Parameters:
        cBlock - 数据块0~63 (the cBlock of card,such as M1 card value 0~63 )
        Returns:
        success will return data, failure will return null.

      • writeBlock

        boolean writeBlock(byte cBlock,
                   byte[] pcBlockData)
            throws RFIDArgumentException
        写卡(Write card)
        Parameters:
        cBlock - 要写入的数据块S50 0-63,S70 0-255(the cBlock of card,such as S50 card value 0~63,S70 0~255)
        pcBlockData - 十六个字节的数据(16 bytes Block data)
        Returns:
        true:success false:fail
        Throws:
        RFIDArgumentException

      • ratsTypeA

        byte[] ratsTypeA()
        CPU卡RATS操作指令(CPU card RATS operation command)
        Returns:
        success will return data, failure will return null.

      • cpuCommand

        byte[] cpuCommand(byte[] cmd)
        CPU卡发送命令(execute cpu card command)
        Parameters:
        cmd - 命令数据
        Returns:
        success will return data, failure will return null.
